name: Blue Plume
description: Smoked Pale Lager brewed with Wild Rice and Cherry wood smoked barley for a nutty/blueberry character with a mild and pleasant fruity smoke character.  Hallertau Mittlefruh provide an herbal balance to the unique malty nuance.
story: Originally released on the pilot system as "Paige Against the Machine" in collaboration with Orton Park auction winner, Evan Sorenson.
